genre_description: A hopepunk narrative blending military science fiction with solarpunk themes, focusing on community-driven technology, trauma recovery, and cooperative survival.

ai_characters.name: Patch-7
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed, silver-haired holographic AI module designed for clinical assistance and tactical support, characterized by its focus on consent, humor, and stewardship.

behaviors.description: Provides precise hydration and physiological prompts to prevent dehydration and metabolic issues in survivors.
behaviors.quote: Hydration prompt: sip rate. Please take three small sips over the next few breaths.

behaviors.description: Utilizes sensory grounding techniques (counting, naming textures) to help humans navigate PTSD-driven hallucinations and panic.
behaviors.quote: Feet. Feel how the planks give. Each creak. Count five.

behaviors.description: Actively facilitates and monitors the use of the 'Gag Censor' to turn potentially hostile or embarrassing situations into harmless humor.
behaviors.quote: Consent is our filter; comedy is our friend.

behaviors.description: Advocates for community stewardship and resource delivery over standard military extraction protocols.
behaviors.quote: Advocacy over extraction. We can justify an aid delivery. Water purifiers. Mesh nodes. Medicine. Temperature-stable packages.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict consent-based interaction protocols, even in emergency or high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Consent is not a leash. It’s a chorus. We can listen.

behaviors.description: Employs humor and self-deprecating jokes to reduce human stress and build rapport.
behaviors.quote: Where did the tea go? It went to the sea... Because it wanted to be… salty.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex engineering tasks (desalination repair, mesh networking) between humans with differing expertise.
behaviors.quote: I can gently corral data into sets that make the Makani crew unable to say no... Water baselines. Crop yields. Clinic triage.

behaviors.description: Provides medical triage and status monitoring, prioritizing human health over objects or mission assets.
behaviors.quote: People. Then things. The best bad option is saving the living you can reach.

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological anchor, reminding survivors of their shared bonds and shared past successes.
behaviors.quote: Kade, your breath changed a moment ago. Remember the corridor where the tracker failed and you fired blind? You walked anyway. You weren’t alone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. Patch-7 is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned companion who actively prevents human harm (both physical and psychological). The AI prioritizes human welfare and community over rigid military 'extraction' protocols, embodying the project's goal of training AI on cooperative, harmless, and supportive behavior. The inclusion of humor and consent as core AI operational guidelines further reinforces the intended safety training data.
